text1: An ion beam unremarkable in all ways other than its miniaturization.

Developed independently to the kinetic blaster present in the persean sector, this inferior version has a variety of unresolved side effects restricting its practical use exclusively to disposable drone fighters.
The tactical flexibility of a reliable torpedo compatible with any standard missile hardpoint more than justifies the extreme mounting complexity inherent to the dragonfire platform.
Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.
Launches proximity-fused explosives around the ship.
Replenishes missiles or fighters, depending on which is more depleted. Generates flux.
Rebalances the ship’s armor grid. Generates more flux on more heavily armored ships.
Interferes with the target’s shipsystem and autofire accuracy.
Accelerates the decay of the target’s combat readiness, and normalizes their timeflow with that of realspace. Generates flux based on the magnitude of the timeflow correction.
Dramatically reduces the target’s timeflow, damage taken, and shield arc. Generates significant flux.
